_sText:
Romans 10:13
Colossians 3:13

Map Name: de_box_bh
Author: Dan Jack 
Alias: Black Hawk
Site: BH-Source.com

There are three bombsites on this map. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------
CT Objective
Bomb Site A - Prevent the terrorist from blowing op the propane tanks
Bomb Site B - Prevent the terrorist from destroying The Lab 
Bomb Site C - Prevent the terrorist from destroying The CT's surplus stockpile
---------------------------------------------------------------------
T Objective
Bomb Site A - Blow up the propane tank, destroying the box
Bomb Site B - Destroy The Lab 
Bomb Site C - Destroy The CT's surplus stockpile
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Email me at Jackster006@hotmail.com if you have questions/comments.
Also if you see any errors on my map or any suggestions on making it
better, send me an E-mail... a picture of the error would be great too.

This map is my Fourth official map. 

Special Thanks:	
- To all sites that host my map.
- The best clan in the world, KORT!
- God and my friends and family

INSTALLATION: 

You must extract de_box_bh.bsp, de_box_bh.res de_box_bh.nav and de_box_bh.txt to:

C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\<YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT>\counter-strike source\maps

and bombc.vmt and bombc.vmf too

C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\black hawk7\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials\VGUI\logos

If you are hosting this map on a server please make sure all Four first are installed correctly.


Enjoy.
